Posts.Content: Apr 23, 2011 04:49PM nwb123 wrote: Thank you so much JBinOk.  I am glad you mentioned that. I just looked at BIRADS score and it is 4b. I will start doing my homework. Good luck to you.
Posts.Title: Waiting to have ultrasound guided biopsy nwb123 vmudrow

Posts.Content: nwb123 wrote: Hi everyone, I am beyond out of my mind, but I don't want my family to worry about me so I have to seem like I have everything under control.  I recently had my mammogram and ultrasound for a lump I found. Those test came back with findings of micro-calcification clusters and and a palpable lump with no focal mass.  So now I am waiting to have the biopsy. Has anyone had  this happen? and should I be concerned? When I asked my surgeon could this be nothing, he said it's definitely something. What does that mean? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Waiting to have ultrasound guided biopsy nwb123 vmudrow
